channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Steam Group Viewer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Steam Group Viewer

item.title: CVE-2021-24476|2024-08-03T19:35:19.539Z -- unknown -- steam%20group%20viewer
item.description: The Steam Group Viewer WordPress plugin through 2.1 does not sanitise or escape its "Steam Group Address" settings before outputting it in the page, leading to an authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue
